title: Let $$x$$ Be the Side Length
text: The first step is to let $$x$$ be the side length of the square to be removed from each corner. Then, the remaining four flaps can be folded up to form an open-top box. Let V be the volume of the resulting box.

title: Find the Equation for Volume
text: The next step is to find the equation for the volume of the box.

title: Representing volume
text: The new length becomes $$24-2x$$, width becomes $$36-2x$$, and height is $$x$$. Multiplying these three will give the expression for volume.

title: Determine the Domain
text: Next, determine the domain of consideration.

title: Find the $$x$$ Value
text: Lastly, find the $$x$$ value for the maximum by setting the $$dV=0$$ and testing the endpoints.
